import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './LandingPage.css'; const LandingPage = () => { return (
{/* Hero Section */}

); }; export default LandingPage;
